news.title: Paul "MuadDib" Atreides takes over the Universe!
news.content: After defeating Feyd-Rautha in a one-on-one duel at Arrakeen, Paul Atreides, son of the late Duke Leto Atreides demanded the hand of Princess Irulan Corrino, claiming ascendance to the Paddisha Throne as well as all the CHOAM stocks held by Shaddam IV. Atreides threatened to destroy the spice fields should his conditions not be met, saying "He who can destroy a thing has the real control of it".
